author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَنِ افْتَحْ عُيُونَهُمْ لِمُشاهَدَةِ جَمالِكَ أَوْ أَرْجِعْهُمْ إِلى مَقَرِّهِمْ فِي أَ
translation: Open Thou their eyes, O my God, and My Master, that they may gaze on Thy beauty, or cause them to return unto the lowest abyss of the fire. Potent art Thou to do what Thou willest. Thou art, verily, the All-Glorious, the All-Wise.
